revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Macho Brace |image = [[File:Macho Brace.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Macho Brace'' |price = 2,000 {{Questpoints}} |location = [[Shops]] }} ==Description== The '''Macho Brace''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to Pokémon [[File:Pokérus (Contagious).png|40px]] infected with [[Pokérus]]. ==Details== Raises the EV gain of the Pokémon holding the Item by 100%. ==Acquisti..."
